review: I bought this for my daughter, I have a roku MHL Stick, Roku 1 and Roku 3, this is by far the slowest streaming device I have come across, the features are all great Roku Apps but I suggest highly to dish out a little more for a Roku 1 or better, preferrably the roku 3 which is awesome and fast, jsut dont waste your time unless you dont mind slow loading times.
author: JOHN MCGEE

review: I have a Roku 2 for my TV and I decided to save some money by purchasing the less expensive Roku Stick for the TV in my spare bedroom.  What I've discovered is that you get what you pay for in terms of speed.  It is markedly slower than the Roku 2, which is frustrating.  It certainly saves space with its form, but I wish I had bought another Roku 2.
